title: Project Planning and Management
description: Define project scope, goals, and timeline. Establish project management processes and communication channels.

title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Conduct comprehensive user research to gather requirements including edge cases and error scenarios. Collaborate with stakeholders and cross-functional teams to ensure alignment with project goals and objectives. Identify key features, system constraints, and user expectations for a successful implementation of the AI Life Assistant. This task involves researching current trends in AI assistants, identifying gaps in the market, and defining unique selling points that will differentiate our product. Upon completion, document findings in a clear, concise format, present to the team, and update the RFC state to 'READY_FOR_REVIEW'. Additionally, ensure the research methodology is robust, and the data collected is validated for accuracy.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture for AI_Life_Assistant following a modular and layered approach with components like user interface, business logic, data access, and external integrations. The design should emphasize scalability, security, performance optimization, maintainability, usability, and accessibility. Consider microservices or serverless architecture for better scalability and maintainability, incorporate security best practices such as data encryption at rest and in transit, and plan for performance optimizations (caching, load balancing, asynchronous processing). Discuss the need for testing methodologies (unit tests, integration tests, system tests) and quality assurance processes during development and deployment. Use agile methodologies for iterative development and continuous delivery/integration. Provide a detailed design document outlining high-level architecture, individual component designs, and interfaces between components. Include a roadmap for implementation and timelines. Investigate the use of containerization technologies (Kubernetes) for deployment flexibility and portability. Also, consider machine learning techniques to improve AI's decision-making capabilities and real-time data processing techniques for specific use cases. Discuss potential benefits and requirements for edge computing in specific use cases, especially where real-time processing is crucial. Ensure that the design accounts for potential privacy concerns associated with edge computing. Furthermore, propose using Kubernetes for containerization due to its robust deployment and scaling features over Docker. Update the rfc_state field to 'UNDER_REVIEW'. Suggest that the design team consider edge computing in cases where real-time processing is crucial, and guarantee that the design takes into account potential privacy concerns associated with edge computing. Also, emphasize the importance of monitoring and logging to ensure system performance and security, and discuss the need for a modular design that allows easy replacement or updating of individual components as needed. Update the 'assigned_to' field to 'code-architect'.

title: Data Management and Storage for AI Life Assistant
description: Propose data models, storage solutions, and data management strategies considering user privacy, performance optimization, scalability, and adaptability to individual preferences and needs. Incorporate a discussion on the use of caching mechanisms to improve system response times, focusing on implementing LRU (Least Recently Used) cache strategy for frequent user requests and dynamic cache eviction based on user activity patterns. Discuss potential approaches to handle cache inconsistencies in real-time collaborative scenarios, considering solutions such as Optimistic Locking or Conflict Resolution strategies. Suggest suitable caching libraries or frameworks for our tech stack (e.g., Redis, Memcached). Recommend best practices for data validation and error handling when dealing with cached data. Provide an outline of the testing plan to ensure the effectiveness and robustness of the proposed solutions. Additionally, consider the impact of system architecture on cache strategies and discuss potential improvements or adjustments needed in the System Architecture Design task before implementation. Address the need for data encryption and anonymization for user privacy concerns. Suggest a timeline for task completion. Update the rfc_state field to 'REVIEW_COMPLETED' once the RFC is reviewed by the code-architect, ready for further action by the assigned team member.

title: AI and Machine Learning Components
description: Develop AI and machine learning models for task management, decision-making, and personalization.

title: User Interface and Experience Design
description: Design the user interface and experience for the AI Life Assistant, considering various interaction modalities such as voice, text, and visual interfaces. The design should be intuitive, adaptive to individual preferences, accessible across multiple platforms (iOS, Android, web), compliant with RFC-5087: User Interface Design for AI Systems, and ensure consistency with our existing product style guide. Additionally, provide design prototypes for validation, considering performance optimization for different devices and network conditions. Address any potential security concerns in the design, including privacy and authentication considerations. Collaborate with frontend developers to implement the design using modern design tools like Figma or Sketch. Update the task to also include testing for usability, accessibility, and performance, and ensure that the design is future-proof by considering emerging interaction technologies and trends such as AR/VR, AI voice assistants, and IoT devices. If possible, provide a timeline for each stage of the design process. Since this task involves both UI/UX design and security considerations, it would be beneficial to assign a team with expertise in these areas, including UI/UX designers, security specialists, accessibility experts, and technical writers. Once the design is approved, provide documentation for developers using technical writing best practices. To streamline the process, I suggest assigning this task to a project manager who can coordinate between different teams and ensure timely delivery. Update the task status to 'NEEDS_REVISSION' as it currently requires further refinement.
